name: cottony
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
made of, or similar to, cotton cloth or thread: He was wearing a brightly-coloured cottony shirt. Many women prefer comfortable cottony underwear. See
cotton
similar to cotton wool (= cotton in the form of a soft mass, usually used for cleaning your skin): It was a perfect summer day with blue skies and cottony clouds. The plant has purple stems coated in cottony bloom.
More examplesFewer examplesThe skirt is made of a white cottony material.Wear cottony lightweight clothes in the daytime when it's hot.Grey cottony hairs had started to spring from her head.Although appetising in appearance, the langoustine was in fact mushy and cottony.
